item.title: EP 392 - The Falkville Metal Man: When Was He From?
item.itunes:title: The Falkville Metal Man: When Was He From?
item.description:
Today we find treasure in the sewers, go on an amazing adventure with some Finnish dude, and then we meet a man made of metal . . . from the future?!?!
